CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "January")=TRUE, "01 - January", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "February")=TRUE, "02 - February", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "March")=TRUE, "03 - March", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "April")=TRUE, "04 - April", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "May")=TRUE, "05 - May", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "June")=TRUE, "06 - June", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "July")=TRUE, "07 - July", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "August")=TRUE, "08 - August", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "September")=TRUE, "09 - September", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "October")=TRUE, "10 - October", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "November")=TRUE, "11 - November", IF(ISPICKVAL( Event__r.Event_Month__c, "December")=TRUE, "12 - December", "TBD" ))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Event Month
